about_the_game:
This content includes the deck recipe and the cards of D-TD03.

[INCLUDED CARDS]
4 copies of each card will be available.
・D-TD03/001EN Youthberk "Protofall Arms"
・D-TD03/002EN Knight of Ardent Light, Youth
・D-TD03/003EN Determined to Break Away, Youth
・D-TD03/004EN Youth Following in Footsteps, Youth
・D-TD03/005EN Youthberk "RevolForm: Zest"
・D-TD03/006EN Internalize Mage
・D-TD03/007EN Knight of Partings, Lloygre
・D-TD03/008EN Stardiness Dragon
・D-TD03/011EN Witch of Revocation, Fectil
・D-TD03/012EN Volition Rigor Dragon
・D-TD03/013EN Arcmya
・D-TD03/014EN Resolute Mage
・D-TD03/015EN Recuperate Angel
・D-TD03/016EN Knight of Piercing, Cadwalla
・D-TD03/018EN Skyfall Fury
・D-SD03/007EN Shadow Bow Archer, Lisana
・D-SD03/009EN Lifesaving Angel, Kurabiel

1 copy of each card is available.
・D-SD03/010EN Spiritual King of Determination, Olbaria

*If you already own the maximum number of cards allowed in-game that are also included in this set, you will receive the equivalent amount of CP (in-game material for card crafting) instead.
detailed_description:
This content includes the deck recipe and the cards of D-TD03.

[INCLUDED CARDS]
4 copies of each card will be available.
・D-TD03/001EN Youthberk "Protofall Arms"
・D-TD03/002EN Knight of Ardent Light, Youth
・D-TD03/003EN Determined to Break Away, Youth
・D-TD03/004EN Youth Following in Footsteps, Youth
・D-TD03/005EN Youthberk "RevolForm: Zest"
・D-TD03/006EN Internalize Mage
・D-TD03/007EN Knight of Partings, Lloygre
・D-TD03/008EN Stardiness Dragon
・D-TD03/011EN Witch of Revocation, Fectil
・D-TD03/012EN Volition Rigor Dragon
・D-TD03/013EN Arcmya
・D-TD03/014EN Resolute Mage
・D-TD03/015EN Recuperate Angel
・D-TD03/016EN Knight of Piercing, Cadwalla
・D-TD03/018EN Skyfall Fury
・D-SD03/007EN Shadow Bow Archer, Lisana
・D-SD03/009EN Lifesaving Angel, Kurabiel

1 copy of each card is available.
・D-SD03/010EN Spiritual King of Determination, Olbaria

*If you already own the maximum number of cards allowed in-game that are also included in this set, you will receive the equivalent amount of CP (in-game material for card crafting) instead.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard DD: Additional Deck [D-TD03]: Raika Koshiba -Skyfall Executors-

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

short_description: This content includes the deck recipe and the cards of D-TD03.
